page.title: 09Recreation
page.content: {D.I.Y.} The chief recreation of fathers is D.I.Y.,48 claiming to be devotees.22 mothers also claimed an interest.In 11 homes it was only the mother who did the D.I.Y.In 27 homes no one did any at all. {Gardening } In 26 homes mothers and fathers took an interest in gardening.In 16 homes no one gardened at all.In the remainder of homes it was the mother who looked after the garden. { Musical Instruments} A very small proportion of people in the survey actually played a musical instrument,but it was noticeable that the 5 men played guitar, accordian, and bass while the mother played piano.In 68 homes no musical instrument was played at all.
